review_1: The graphics are great so is the story lines
review_2: This is an amazing game for people who love the series, it's super fun but there are a few minor inconveniences. For example: The characters' mouths don't move when they are talking on the broom, There are no male avatar options (However that is expected since Luna Nova is a school for witches, not wizards) , The graphics are quite low but I didn't mind it at all, There barely any people on the online play And finally, after you complete the game, it gets pretty boring. But i am still rating it 4 stars because it was really fun to play while doing the races with various characters from the series and the animation is really good!
